name: GOG.com - Hide Galaxy Buttons
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
If you haven't switched to GOG Galaxy by now, you probably don't want to. This style clears out the big, annoying Galaxy buttons, leaving only the subdued About > GOG Galaxy entry in the site header.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.
